<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. It's Veronica.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to disturb you this early.
<PAGE>
You recall our previous discussion about the
StreetPass service, right?
<PAGE>
We're now offering another, similar service, and
I've come to tell you about it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm proud to announce that we're now running
<BLUE>Farm Tours</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Through this service, you can both invite other
farmers to visit your farm, and visit their farms
yourself.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can access this service straight from the
<RED>Title Screen</RED>.
<PAGE>
If you're working and decide you would like to
go on a Farm Tour, simply write in your Journal
and then return to the Title Screen.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please feel free to ask me any questions you
may have regarding Farm Tours. I'll do my best
to answer them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What would you like to know?
How to begin.
About the different modes.
What can I do?
How to end.
Next
About souvenirs.
About the Magic Wand.
About Actions.
Return
I'm fine, thanks.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farm Tours begin from the <RED>Title Screen</RED>. If you're
working on your farm, write in your journal and
return to the title screen, then select <RED>Multiplayer</RED>.
<PAGE>
Once you have chosen Multiplayer, you will be
given the option to choose which mode you
would like to use.
<PAGE>
There are two modes: <RED>Local Connection</RED> and
<RED>Internet Connection</RED>.
<PAGE>
If you choose <RED>Internet Connection</RED>, you will be
given the choice to <RED>Farm with Anyone</RED> or just
<RED>Farm with Friends</RED>.
<PAGE>
Once you have chosen the mode you prefer, you
may decide to <RED>open your farm</RED> or <RED>search for
farms</RED>.
<PAGE>
Choosing <RED>Open Farm</RED> will allow you to invite
other players to visit your farm.
<PAGE>
Choosing <RED>Search for Farm</RED> will allow you to visit
other players' farms.
<PAGE>
A maximum of 4 players may be connected at
once, so try visiting everyone from new farmers
to old friends.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<RED>Local Connection</RED> mode allows you to visit with
players who are near you. You can use this
mode when your friends are around.
<PAGE>
<RED>Internet Connection</RED> mode allows you to visit
with players who are not located near you.
<PAGE>
You can choose <RED>Farm with Anyone</RED> to connect
with players you haven't met before, or <RED>Farm
with Friends</RED> to visit players on your friend list.
<PAGE>
However, as you may have guessed, you cannot
use the <RED>Farm with Friends</RED> option if you do not
have any friends registered on your friend list.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Multiple players can gather at one player's farm
and do things such as <RED>Chat</RED> or use the <RED>Magic
Wand</RED>.
<PAGE>
Waving the Magic Wand at crops will improve
their quality, while waving it at livestock will
lower their stress.
<PAGE>
You can also communicate with the other
players using Actions.
<PAGE>
However, please be aware that while the
connection is active, you will not be able to lift
or exchange items.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you want to close the connection, please
come speak to me. I will be at the farm.
<PAGE>
Talk to me and select <BLUE>Close Connection</BLUE> to end
your visit.
<PAGE>
Once closed, you can't return to the same
unique instance, so finish everything you want
to do before choosing Close Connection.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you go to visit other farms or invite others
to visit your farm, we strongly encourage you to
have <RED>gifts</RED> ready.
<PAGE>
If you're visiting another player's farm, you may
take ONE item as a gift.
<PAGE>
On the other hand, if you're having other players
visit your farm, you should have THREE items
available as gifts.
<PAGE>
If you don't have your gifts ready to go, <RED>you will
not be able to connect</RED>.
<PAGE>
Gifts received from others will be held at the
guild.
<PAGE>
Once your visit is over, please come to the guild
and retrieve your gift -- sooner is better, of
course. This is important because...
<PAGE>
<RED>If you begin a new Multiplayer session before
retrieving your gift from the Guild, the old gift
will be permanently lost.</RED>

All players who visit another's farm will be given
a <RED>Magic Wand</RED>. Press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to wave it.
<PAGE>
If you wave the Magic Wand at a growing crop,
it's <BLUE>quality</BLUE> will slightly <RED>increase</RED>.

If you wave the Magic Wand at an animal, its
<BLUE>stress</BLUE> will slightly <RED>decrease</RED>.
<PAGE>
You may wave the wand at each crop and each
animal once per visit.

The Magic Wand has no effect on anything
besides growing crops and livestock animals.

Next, let's talk a little about <RED>Action</RED> commands.
During a Multiplayer session, your bottom
screen will  look like what's shown above.

To perform an Action, just touch the
corresponding Action Button.

The 7 available Actions are:
<BLUE>Happy</BLUE> : <BLUE>Angry</BLUE> : <BLUE>Sad</BLUE> : <BLUE>Concerned</BLUE> : <BLUE>Blush</BLUE> :
<BLUE>Surprised</BLUE> : <BLUE>Thinking</BLUE>

You can use these Actions to dynamically
express your feelings.

Now, let's talk about <RED>Chat</RED>. As displayed on the
top screen, you may input messages to speak
directly to other players.

To input messages, touch the keyboard icon on
the bottom screen.

A keyboard will appear, allowing you to type
messages that will be displayed on the top
screen.

If you happen to miss something another player
said, you can go back and re-read it via the <RED>Log</RED>
on the bottom screen.

You may view up to a maximum of 4
conversations.
<PAGE>
You should try chatting. It's a great way to get
acquainted with the people you meet.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Finally, just as a gentle reminder, remember that
during Multiplayer sessions, <RED>your name, your
farm name, your animals' names...</RED>
<PAGE>
<RED>along with your barn, coop and pet house
names will be visible to the other players.</RED>
<PAGE>
When you chat, <RED>other players can see what you
write</RED>, obviously, so be mindful when choosing
your words.
<PAGE>
And just like with StreetPass, when you use the
Farm Tour service, other players will come to
visit your town too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If there is anything you are unclear on, simply
take a look at the book I have added to your
bookshelf.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Remember, when you would like to use the
Farm Tour service, please <RED>write in your journal
and return to the Title Screen</RED>.
<PAGE>
That should be everything. Again, my apologies
for giving you so much information so early in
the morning. Now, if you'll excuse me.
<BLUE>Farm Tours</BLUE> has been added to my bookshelf.
